description.value:
Aura 4

Only when bloodied; enemies who start their turns within the aura are slowed until the start of their next turn.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Reach 2

+35 vs AC; 3d8+6 damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+35 vs AC; 4d8+11 damage, plus target is grabbed or knocked prone (Maglubiyet's choice).

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When damaged by a melee or ranged attack, at-will

Maglubiyet makes one axe attack against a target within reach.

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Close burst 2

Maglubiyet makes an axe attack against all enemies in the burst that he can see

At-Will

Standard

Maglubiyet throws the grabbed enemy at a Medium or smaller target. Ranged 10

+33 vs Reflex; 3d10+7 damage to target and the hurled enemy, plus target is pushed 1 square and knocked prone. Effect: The hurled enemy falls prone in the square formerly occupied by the target (or the nearest legal square, if the target was not pushed).

Fire

Standard, Recharge When First Bloodied

Close blast 6

Trigger: When first bloodied

+31 vs Reflex; 3d12+11 fire damage, plus the target is weakened and blinded (save ends). Miss: Half damage, and the target is blinded until the end of its next turn.

Recharge 6

Close burst 4

Bloodied enemies only; +31 vs Will; the target takes psychic damage equal its healing surge value; targets on 20th level or lower are killed instead.

Encounter ✦ Fire, Psychic

Close burst 10

Trigger: When maglubiyet is reduced to 0 hit points, encounter

+33 vs Fortitude; 5d10+11 fire and psychic damage. Miss: Half damage.
Maglubiyet's axe and claw attacks deal +10 damage when he is bloodied.

Encounter

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When maglubiyet suffers an effect that a save can end

Maglubiyet rolls a saving throw against the effect.

system.biography:
HP 1465; Bloodied 732
Resist 15 fire, 30 radiant 		Init +25 | AP 2 | Save +5 (+7 against fear)
AC 46 (44 when bloodied)Fort 48Ref 45 (43 when bloodied)Will 44 (50 against fear)
Speed 6 (8 when bloodied), teleport 6
Ability ScoresStr 32 (+27)
Con 29 (+25)		Dex 29 (+25)
Int 22 (+22)		Wis 25 (+23)
Cha 29 (+25)
Languages Goblin, Supernal
Alignment Evil
Skills Intimidate +30, Religion +27Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 33 | Insight 33

Equipment axe
